title: server does not provide e-tags for newly uploaded files
body:
i have problems with syncing between an owncloud-6 instance and a linux based desktop. the combination used to work fine before upgrading from oc-5.0.13 to oc-6.0.0. i asked on the mailing list but did not get a reply. so i document the issue here, since i fail to solve it and the problem grows with each file uploaded: 

### expected behaviour
newly uploaded files should be synced to my desktop when the desktop client is running (linux/kde). 

### actual behaviour
i get a lot of activitiy according to the clients log (many files claimed to be synced every single minute over and over again, yet most of these actually do not get synced. 
instead i find warnings for a growing number of files (i *think* only files uploaded after upgrading to owncloud 6): "no e-tag received from server" all files producing that warning/error do not get synced to the desktop although queried again and again every minute. 

### steps to reproduce
upload a new file to owncloud 6
run a desktop client
look at the clients "activity"

### server configuration
operating system: 
opensuse 12.3 (linux@x86_64)

web server: 
apache 2.2 from standard repositories

database:
mariadb-5.5.33 from standard repositories

php version: 
php-5.4 from standard repositories

owncloud version: 
6.0.0a (stable)

updated from an older owncloud or fresh install: 
upgraded from 5.0.13

list of activated app: 
just core apps and "fluxx compensator (y)"

the content of config/config.php: (without the database password and passwordsalt)

$config = array (

  'maintenance' => false,
  'theme' => '',
);


are you using external storage, if yes which one:
a single dropbox folder, but deactivating it for a test did not change anything. 

### client configuration
browser:
mostly chromium, konqueror and ff, but that is not related

operating system:
opensuse-13.1@x86_64
